text: Danilo Špoljarić (; born 14 July 1999) is a Cypriot footballer who plays as a midfielder for Zemplín Michalovce on loan from Apollon Limassol. ==Personal life== Danilo Špoljarić is the son of former Apollon Limassol and Cyprus international midfielder Milenko Špoljarić. title: Danilo Špoljarić
